about_the_game:
[Greed Born from Fear]

Mankind's materialistic obsession during desperate times is indistinguishable from the thirst of monsters stalking them. Explore abandoned suburban buildings and dark, uncharted underground tunnels for supplies and firepower to gain an edge in survival. Keep in mind that gaining the upper hand in survival may also include raiding and looting other survivors, cementing your place in this world where even the light cannot reach. Remember that in the World of the Dead, only the survivors who overcome the raids and horrors of the hideous monsters can claim the spoils.

[Combat System Including Modern Weaponry and Armor Modifications]

In the World of the Dead, where the line between life and death is blurred, a requiem of cold weapons clashing amidst explosions never ceases. The World of the Dead combines first-person horror shooter action with a modern weapon modification system to create a unique experience. Choose the right balance of expensive items and defensive/offensive means in your inventory, customize your own guns with various combinations of weapons and attachments, and rise victorious by eliminating everything that stands in the way of your survival. Each weapon class can deal additional or reduced damage on certain types of enemies, so make sure you have the right weapon to gain an advantage in the upcoming battle.

[High-Risk, High-Return Hell on Earth]

The realm overrun by the rotting dead, ruthless beasts looking for a prey, and insidious demons promises a wealth of riches, but it can also lead the trespasser to a horrific end. Poor souls who let their guard down and approach the undead, beasts, and demons unprotected will become victims, mercilessly ripped apart. Compete with other survivors to win the race and emerge as the ultimate survivor. Prove your worth by escaping through safe zones that appear throughout the map, carrying goods and loot taken from monsters and other survivors.

[Friendship That Shines in the Dark]

Even in this hellish world where trust is scarce, you'll always have your most trusted allies. Form Duo or Squad teams with your trusted companions, each with their own unique arsenal for strategic battles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: The World of the Dead is an immersive zombie FPS game that combines first-person shooter and extraction PvPvE genres. In a world of walking corpses and deformed monsters, you'll have to forge your own path to survival while keeping an eye for new firearms and equipment.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
